mapper.select: SELECT tb.board_contents FROM TB_BOARD tb WHERE tb.board_dv_cd = 'MMM' AND board_reg_mmr_seq = #{memberSeq }
INSERT INTO TB_BOARD ( board_dv_cd, board_title, board_contents, board_reg_mmr_seq, board_reg_dt, center_seq ) VALUES( 'MMM', '메모장', '', #{memberSeq }, current_timestamp(), NULL )

SELECT calendar_dt , COUNT(calendar_dt) AS calendar_cnt FROM TB_CALENDAR WHERE center_seq = #{centerSeq } AND SUBSTR(calendar_dt, 1, 7) = SUBSTR(#{calendarDt }, 1, 7) GROUP BY calendar_dt ORDER BY calendar_dt

INSERT INTO TB_CALENDAR ( calendar_dt, calendar_contents, calendar_color_cd, calendar_reg_mmr_seq, calendar_reg_dt, center_seq) VALUES( #{calendarDt }, #{calendarContents }, #{calendarColorCd }, #{calendarRegMmrSeq }, current_timestamp(), #{centerSeq } )
INSERT INTO TB_SCHEDULER ( children_seq, scheduler_week_cd, scheduler_time_cd, scheduler_reg_mmr_seq ) VALUES( #{childrenSeq }, #{schedulerWeekCd }, #{schedulerTimeCd }, #{schedulerRegMmrSeq } )
